Name: Polar Penguin
About the game: Help the lost penguin find his way home to his family. Magnetize your way through obstacles along the journey and avoid possible dangers on your path. This game is a short physics based platformer using magnets to traverse yourself and your surroundings. The game contains: Cute looking predators 20 different levels Magnetizing fun Slippery ground
